thread.title: People Are Roasting Malcolm Turnbull After Donald Trump Apparently Owned Him In A Phone Call - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: People Are Roasting Malcolm Turnbull After Donald Trump Apparently Owned Him In A Phone Call - BuzzFeed News

author: Brad Esposito
title: People Are Roasting Malcolm Turnbull After Donald Trump Apparently Owned Him In A Phone Call - BuzzFeed News
text:
The two leaders were speaking to discuss a deal made in the last days of the Obama administration that would see the US take in 1,250 refugees from Australia’s offshore detention network. “This is the worst deal ever,” Trump reportedly said, before accusing the Australian prime minister of attempting to export “the next Boston bombers”.
When Turnbull attempted to change the topic to the conflict in Syria, Trump reportedly ended the call.
In an interview on 2GB radio on Thursday afternoon, Turnbull denied Trump had hung up on him.
“This is not a deal that [Trump] would have done or that he would regard as a good deal,” he said. “But it is one he has committed to.”
ID: 10446740 2. Almost immediately after the Washington Post ’s story went live, people took to Twitter to mock the Australian prime minister for being mercilessly owned. Trump vaguely threatened to invade Mexico but he also told our unpopular PM his was the worst phone call so LOOK OUT
— Helen Davidson (@heldavidson) ID: 10446730 I think Australia got the news
— Dave Itzkoff (@ditzkoff) ID: 10446736 4. There were plenty of Simpsons references. Trump: "This is the worst deal ever." Turnbull:
— Mitch Feltscheer (@mitchfel) ID: 10446733 Trump obviously hasn't played knifey-spooney before
— Stephen Jeffery (@stephenejeffery) ID: 10446751 6. And others were just shook. Turnbull refuses to comment on reports that Trump hung up on him
— Katelyn (@asifkatelyn) ID: 10446732 First, he came for Australia, and I said nothing, because I was so confused
— Alena Smith (@internetalena) ID: 10446790 8. Most of the conversation, though, centred on the schoolyard. [turnbull walks to prime ministerial podium] i just spoke to president trump and i got dunked on in historic fashion
— fakeed (@fakeedbutler) ID: 10446738 turnbull just getting constantly dunked on this last few weeks
— bad hombre (@pissbeast) ID: 10446741 i see malcolm turnbull received an atomic wedgie in the playground today. nice
— chloe sargeant (@chlosarge) ID: 10446744 reckon trump did that LBJ powermove at took the call to turnbull while on the toilet. TURNBULL: Mr President! May I- [unending shit noises]
— Ben Jenkins (@bencjenkins) ID: 10446745 [in a headlock after being wedgied] the US Australia relationship has never been stronger
— the result respecter (@rpy) ID: 10446748 Malcolm Turnbull paid $1.7 million dollars to be bullied by Donald Trump over the phone
— j.r. hennessy (@jrhennessy) ID: 10446749 14. And this photo, taken during Trump’s phone call to Turnbull, suddenly had a new meaning. After THAT Washington Post story on the phone call, suddenly the photo of Trump giving the finger while speaking to… https://t.co/RiihgLrUkV
— Andrew Brown (@AndrewBrownAU) ID: 10446746 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Brad Esposito is a news reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney, Australia. Contact Brad Esposito at bradley.esposito@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
